attributes.action: cancel the reciprocal voting agreement between the UK and Eire
attributes.background: Rescind the agreement allowing Irish citizens a vote in UK elections and UK citizens a vote in theirs. Some 300,000 + Irish citizens can vote in UK elections which biased the Referendum result

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The ability of UK citizens to vote in elections in Ireland is a matter for the Irish state.
